=Others ressources=

===Thydzik's "Symbol you want on color you want" (you need to host files on your server) ===

Theses markers are totally dynamic, and you can create whatever balloon icon you want. 

Just change the URL like : thydzik.com/thydzikGoogleMap/markerlink.php?text=*12*&color=*5680FC* where *12* is the text and *5680FC* is the hexadecimal color. 

You can't hot link from your personnal map (maps.google.com).
It can be done in 2 ways :
1/ host the php file generating the icons
2/ save the icons, and host them your server

Please follow the examples :

*Blue (1) example*
{{{
http://thydzik.com/thydzikGoogleMap/markerlink.php?text=1&color=5680FC
}}}
<img src="http://thydzik.com/thydzikGoogleMap/markerlink.php?text=1&color=5680FC&image=.png">

http://thydzik.com/thydzikGoogleMap/markerlink.php?text=A&color=5680FC
}}}
